values: Every order over \$25 comes with free delivery. You're also welcome to pickup in store.
We have a limited 30-day return policy for all our products. If it doesn't work out for you just bring it back and we'll refund you immediately!

Great. There are some important questions I need to ask to suggest the right faucet for you. Let's get started! Is the faucet for your kitchen or bathroom?
